text: Chance upon this on the web while struggling to find last minute costumes found this splendid Awesome Costume for my DnD! Very prompt response at wee hours (not that I should do that to disturb others) but Ben responded earnestly! You can't find such Awesome service anywhere else!! The costume 1920s Gatsby style is just amazing!! Won me the best dress award for the night. What can I say!! Nothing but just Awesome Costume can do for you. Try them! Local company without a shopfront for now but hey! That's where the Gem are found!! Thanks Ben for your terribly Awesome service! ðŸ¥³

Messaged a few costume companies but only Awesome Costumes got back to me.

As a size XXL person, was quite afraid I wouldn't be able to fit anything but I just needed to give them my theme and waist/chest measurements and boom, he made me a "badass pirate" with a costume that fit perfectly on the first try.

In keeping with the name Awesome Costumes, all my colleagues were in awe and kept asking me where I got my outfit from.

Needless to say I won best costume which makes this the 2nd time out of 2 times I have rent from Awesome Costumes.

A bit pricey but worth it for a good time and lots of laughs.

I rented a Samsui woman costume and was impressed by the authenticity and completeness of the props provided. The staff were easygoing and professional, offering valuable recommendations to enhance the overall look. Highly satisfied with the service!

Awesome costume team is truly awesome! They managed to let me rent Mexico costume and the hat at a last minute which is one day before my school event ! They are down to earth, reliable , honest, friendly and personanle . Do support their costume business as they will try to accommodate to your needs whenever you need it .

Super convenient!! The collection and return of costume was very easy and Ben was very punctual. Contacted Ben through Whatsaap who then gave me a list of Star Wars theme costumes. I rented a Chewbacca costume which was a head turner, and was even stopped a few times by passerby to take pictures while on my way to the convention hall! Highly recommend Awesome Costume for your costume needs:)
